com.example.android

Class ChatActivity.MessageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.firebase.ui.database.FirebaseListAdapter<ChatActivity.ChatMessage>
        • com.example.android.ChatActivity.MessageAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    ChatActivity

    public class ChatActivity.MessageAdapter
extends com.firebase.ui.database.FirebaseListAdapter<ChatActivity.ChatMessage>
    And God gave ChatActivity.MessageAdapter the divine purpose of populating the list of messages in the UI with concrete ChatActivity.ChatMessage sent between passenger and driver.
